name: Florid'Alloween
description:
October 31st, Florida.

Larry, Johnny, Kevin and Devon are wandering in the streets of Tallahassee. looking for an activity to fill their lovely evening. Happily drinking some completely inoffensive beers, they happen to  cross the path of a ghost, in the middle of the street.

A REAL GHOST. Despite being frightened as hell, they decide to chase the evil creature to its lair. The evil creature is not moving really fast, being almost as quick as a little kid rushing to a Halloween party could be.

After almost 40 secs of  chasing, our troupe is finally able to see the ghost entering a spooky house, decorated with pumpkins, skeletons and spider webs. Gathering their courage, they decide to pick up some good old Whisky at the nearest WallMart and to come back to purge the city from the evil creatures living in this weird mansion.
